item.description:
Hey gang unfortunately a lot of people had scheduling conflicts so going to Providence for the Waterfire had to be postponed. No big deal, there are a few dates left for that so if people are interested we can re-visit.

Anyway, I still figured it would still be cool to get together and hang out for a bit. I found a really cool place for us to hang out with a few cocktails and relax off the water to come down from a hectic week. That place is Atlantic Beer Garden off Seaport Blvd. across from the World Trade Center & Seaport Hotel. They have a large outside deck area overlooking the water which is an awsome sight if it's nice that day.

This is also a great place for an affordable dinner so who ever is interested in meeting up this Friday, August 7th around 6:30 or so please let me know by replying on the site to this event. By Wednesday or Thursday depending how many we have I will make reservations for dinner.

Hope to see as many of you as possible on Friday and here is the direction links to the place. As far as closest T-stops that would be Courthouse Station off the Silverline. Silverline can be picked up at Southstation. I will send an email this week with instructions on where to find each other.

www.atlanticbeergarden.com
146 Northern Ave
Boston, MA 02210-1802
(617) 357-8000
item.name: Friday Night Drinks at Atlantic Beer Garden
